requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 280 series or higher
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Equivelant
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GPU with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit or Newer
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 1050 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

results.name: Rings of Medusa 2: The Return of Medusa
